text: Anthony Joseph Foyt, Jr. (born January 16, 1935) is an American racecar driver. He was a four-time Indianapolis 500 winner. He also won at the Daytona 500. ==Early life== Foyt was born in Houston, Texas. He attended Pershing and Hamilton middle schools and Lamar, San Jacinto and St. Thomas Catholic high schools, but he dropped out to become a mechanic. ==References== == Other websites == *Official team owner website * * Category:NASCAR drivers Category:American racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from Houston Category:1935 births Category:Living people
title: A. J. Foyt
